name: SRDeletionReason
desc: Reasons that the framework deletes samples.

items.name: case ageLimit
items.desc: Indicates that the sample outlived the framework’s retention limit.

items.name: case lowDiskSpace
items.desc: Indicates that the system’s disk space is low.

items.name: case noInterestedClients
items.desc: Indicates that the sensor has no active stakeholders.

items.name: case systemInitiated
items.desc: Indicates that the system requests deletion.

items.name: case userInitiated
items.desc: Indicates that the user requests deletion.
